item.title: Mentioned by Hill Times (subscription)
item.description:
NDP MP Donnelly vows to continue fight to ban shark fin imports into Canada ...
Photograph by Steve Gerecke, The Hill Times. NDP MP Fin Donnelly, pictured at a recent House committee meeting, is trying to get Canada to ban shark fin imports One-third of the estimated 100 million sharks being slaughtered annually is facing extinction.
